long_description: Here are 3 dramatic new colors. The new Vibrant Image lures feature a UV enhanced iridescent pearl base finish and colorful graphics optimized for maximum attraction while spinning. Color graphics are digitally applied into the paint for extreme durability and detail for all fishing conditions. The fact that they are offered in UV colors means FishSeeUV and you catch more fish.  This new series will be particularly effective on bass, crappie, perch and all gamefish.
google_categorization: Sporting Goods > Outdoor Recreation > Fishing > Fishing Lures
